structure.unit: ARTICLE XII. PUBLIC AND BUS PASSENGER BENCHES AND SHELTERS

text.section:
Sec. 21-163. Insurance.
All permittees, before placing any benches on public rights-of-way in the unincorporated area of the County subject to this article, shall carry such insurance and submit evidence of such insurance to MDTA as may be required by the County. No permits shall be issued until the permittee has complied with this requirement. A permittee shall not cancel the required insurance coverage at any time without the express written consent of the MDTA Executive Director.
